--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Nate Ledbetter 
<ltdomer98@y...> wrote:
> 
> --- Eponymous13@a... wrote:
> QUESTIONS: 
> and how many
> > kids did she give Asai?  
> > I've seen 3 daughters pretty consistently, but was
> > it one son or two? 
> 
> I'm fairly sure it was one--Manpukumaru. Dates, I
> can't help you off the top of my head. 
> 

Oeyo (1579-1632) Married Tokugawa Hidetada, gave him 7 children.
Yodo (d.1616) Mother of Hideyori
Hatsu - I don't seem to have any info on her.
Manpukumaru - killed by Nobunaga.
